get.description: Retrieve a best price offer given an origin and destination.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Departure city. 3-letter IATA city code

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination city. 3-letter IATA city code

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: Departure date in local time (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: returnDate
parameters.description: Return date in local time (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Optional parameter.

get.description: A description of all available seat details by aircraft type. You can retrieve the full set or details for a particular aircraft type.

parameters.name: aircraftCode
parameters.description: Aircraft type. 3-character IATA equipment code

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: cabinCode
parameters.description: Cabin class: M, E, C, F (Acceptable values are: "", "M", "E", "C", "F")

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 language code

get.description: Retrieve order by ID and optionally name. This service is only accessible for LH privileged partners

parameters.name: orderID
parameters.description: Unique order identifier

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Surname of traveller

put.description: Trigger an automatic check-in given a ticket number. This service is only accessible for LH privileged partners

parameters.name: ticketnumber
parameters.description: Ticket number

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: Email address

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

get.description: Retrieve passenger trip, contact and baggage details. This service is only accessible for LH privileged partners

parameters.name: searchID
parameters.description: Bag tag number, PNR, boarding card or FQTV ID

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

get.description: Retrieve all available fares per fare family for a specific Origin & Destination on a given date

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Search fares from these carriers' catalogues - currently active for Germanwings only  (4U)

parameters.name: segments
parameters.description: Journey details  e.g. (origin=TXL;destination=CGN;travel-date=2016-12-15;return-date=2016-12-20;cabin=Economy)

parameters.name: carriers
parameters.description: Include fares for these carriers e.g. ('4U;LH')

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: travelers
parameters.description: Type and number of travelers e.g. (adult=1;child=1;infant=1)

parameters.name: fare-types
parameters.description: Fares family: basic,smart, best, smartflex, bestflex - Germanwings only (Acceptable values are: "", "basic", "smart", "best", "smartflex", "bestflex")

get.description: Retrieves all available fares for a specific Origin & Destination pair on a given date. Available fares are: One-way and Return for 4U. Return only for OS

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Specifies in which catalogue the fares need to be searched (e.g.'4U;OS').

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Enter journey origin (e.g 'FRA').

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Enter journey destination (e.g 'MAD').

parameters.name: travel-date
parameters.description: Enter journey travel-date (e.g 2016-10-20)

parameters.name: return-date
parameters.description: Enter journey return-date (e.g 2016-10-31)'.

parameters.name: cabin-class
parameters.description: Enter the required cabin class (e.g econonmy, business etc.). (Acceptable values are: "", "economy", "premium economy", "business", "first")

parameters.name: travelers
parameters.description: Specifies the type and number of travelers (e.g. '(adult=2;child=2;infant=1)') For LH only (adult=1) possible.

parameters.name: fare-family
parameters.description: Mandatory for 4U. Specifies, which fares to be returned, such as basic, smart, best, smartflex, bestflex . (Acceptable values are: "", "basic", "smart", "best", "smartflex", "bestflex")

parameters.name: trackingid
parameters.description: Austrian Airlines only - specify the web tracking id to be used in OS Deep link.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Mandatory http header:  application/xml or application/json

get.description: Retrieve lowest fare for a specific Origin & Destination pair on a given date. Available fares are: One-way and Return for 4U. Return only for OS & LH

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Search fares from these carriers' catalogues e.g. '4U;OS;LH'

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Journey origin. 3-letter IATA aiport code e.g. 'FRA'

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Journey destination. 3-letter IATA airport code e.g. 'MAD'

parameters.name: travel-date
parameters.description: Journey travel-date YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: return-date
parameters.description: Journey return-date - mandatory for OS and LH searches YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: cabin-class
parameters.description: Cabin class: 'economy', 'premium_economy', 'business', 'first' (Acceptable values are: "", "economy", "premium_economy", "business", "first")

parameters.name: travelers
parameters.description: Type and number of travelers e.g. '(adult=2;child=2;infant=1)'. For LH only (adult=1) possible

parameters.name: fare-family
parameters.description: Fare family: basic, smart, best, smartflex, bestflex - Germanwings only (Acceptable values are: "", "basic", "smart", "best", "smartflex", "bestflex")

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code of requestor. 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g. 'de')

get.description: Retrieve best fares for the requested journey across multiple days or multiple months.

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Search fares from these carriers' catalogues (e.g. '4U;OS;LH')

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Journey origin. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'FRA')

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Journey destination. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'MAD')

parameters.name: travel-date
parameters.description: Journey travel-date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: trip-duration
parameters.description: Trip duration in days (e.g. '7')

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Fare range: 'byday' or 'bymonth' (Acceptable values are: "byday", "bymonth")

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: cabin-class
parameters.description: Cabin class: 'economy', 'premium_economy', 'business', 'first' (Acceptable values are: "", "economy", "premium_economy", "business", "first")

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code of requestor. 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g. 'de')

parameters.name: trackingid
parameters.description: Austrian Airlines only - specify the web tracking id to be used in OS Deep link.

parameters.name: fare-family
parameters.description: Fare family: basic, smart, best, smartflex, bestflex - Germanwings only (Acceptable values are: "", "basic", "smart", "best", "smartflex", "bestflex")

get.description: Create a subscription for best price O&D. Receive regular updates on lowest fares

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Journey origin. 3-leter IATA airport code (e.g. 'FRA')

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Journey destination. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'MAD')

parameters.name: cabin-class
parameters.description: Cabin class: 'economy', 'premium_economy', 'business', 'first' (Acceptable values are: "", "economy", "premium_economy", "business", "first")

parameters.name: trip-duration
parameters.description: Trip duration in days (e.g. '7')

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email Address')

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 language code

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code

parameters.name: trackingid
parameters.description: Tracking parameter

get.description: Returns valid LH deep links (FFP - links to flight selection screen on LH.COM)

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Carrier for which the deep link will be created (e.g. 'LH')

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Journey origin. 3-letter IATA airport or city code (e.g. 'FRA')

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Journey destination. 3-letter IATA airport or city code (e.g. 'MAD')

parameters.name: travel-date
parameters.description: Journey travel-date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: trackingid
parameters.description: Deep link tracking ID

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 language code

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: return-date
parameters.description: Journey return-date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: cabin-class
parameters.description: Cabin class: 'economy', 'premium_economy', 'business', 'first' (Acceptable values are: "", "economy", "premium_economy", "business", "first")

parameters.name: travelers
parameters.description: Type and number of travelers (e.g. '(adult=2;child=2;infant=1)')

parameters.name: partnerid
parameters.description: Deep link partner id (e.g. '1247')

parameters.name: encryption-key
parameters.description: Deep link encryption-key

get.description: Returns valid LH deep links (ITCO - links to shopping cart on LH.COM)

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Carrier for which the deep link will be created (e.g. 'LH')

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Journey origin. 3-letter IATA airport or city code (e.g. 'FRA')

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Journey destination. 3-letter IATA airport or city code (e.g. 'MAD')

parameters.name: travel-date
parameters.description: Journey travel-date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: outbound-segments
parameters.description: Outbound flight segments in the sequence of travel (e.g. 'LH096;LH480')

parameters.name: fare
parameters.description: Travel fare (e.g. '1341.45')

parameters.name: fare-currency
parameters.description: Fare currency (e.g. 'EUR')

parameters.name: trackingid
parameters.description: Deep link tracking ID

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 language code

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

parameters.name: return-date
parameters.description: Journey return-date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: cabin-class
parameters.description: Cabin class: 'economy', 'premium_economy', 'business', 'first' (Acceptable values are: "", "economy", "premium_economy", "business", "first")

parameters.name: return-segments
parameters.description: Flight segments in the sequence of travel (e.g. 'LH7465;LH431')

parameters.name: travelers
parameters.description: Type and number of travelers (e.g. '(adult=2;child=2;infant=1)')

parameters.name: net-fare
parameters.description: Travel net fare. Total fare less taxes and charges (e.g. '1140')

parameters.name: partnerid
parameters.description: Deep link partner id (e.g. '1247')

parameters.name: encryption-key
parameters.description: Deep link encryption-key

get.description: Returns LH route origin & destination information

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Enter either the orgin city or orgin country code (e.g 'FRA' or 'DE'). Enter '*' for all

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Enter either the destination city or country code (e.g 'MAD' or 'ES'). Enter '*' for all

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Mandatory http header:  application/xml or application/json

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Carrier for which the OND will be retrieved (e.g. 'LH')

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0

get.description: Returns LH Top routes per country or across all countries

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Mandatory http header:  application/xml or application/json

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Carrier for which the OND will be retrieved (e.g. 'LH')

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Enter the origin country code (e.g. 'DE'). Leave empty to search Top OND across all countries

get.description: Returns LH network route status information. Search for recently added or retired routes

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Mandatory http header:  application/xml or application/json

parameters.name: catalogues
parameters.description: Carrier for which the OND will be retrieved (e.g. 'LH')

parameters.name: new-routes
parameters.description: Enter if newly added routes should be returned in the response. (Acceptable values are: "", "true", "false")

parameters.name: old-routes
parameters.description: Enter if old (deleted) routes should be returned in the response. (Acceptable values are: "", "true", "false")
